profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by David Hill using EADitor ©2011

change.item: Imported into EADitor. Some normalization has occurred to apply EAD 2002 schema validation and conform to EADitor basic requirements.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: A detailed chronological record of coin purchases from virtually every sale held during the period 1874 to 1882

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: E.S. Phillips was a coin collector or dealer from Bridgeport, Connecticut.

note.p: 301 pages with p. 239-298 removed, red quarter roan and marbled boards, 31x14 cm.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Contains a detailed chronological record of coin purchases from virtually every sale held during the period 1874 to 1882, including those of Cogan, Harzfeld, Strobridge, Scott, Proskey, Frossard, Woodward, and Haseltine, with transcriptions of catalog descriptions and prices paid for thousands of lots acquired.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: E.S. Phillips ledger, 1874-1882, Archives, American Numismatic Society.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: Copyright restrictions may apply. Permission to publish or reproduce must be secured from the American Numismatic Society.
